paint.paintEditor.hue.description: Label for the hue component in the color picker

paint.paintEditor.saturation.description: Label for the saturation component in the color picker

paint.paintEditor.brightness.description: Label for the brightness component in the color picker

paint.paintEditor.fill.description: Label for the color picker for the fill color

paint.lineMode.line.description: Label for the line tool, which draws straight line segments

paint.modeTools.brushSize.description: Label for the brush size input

paint.modeTools.eraserSize.description: Label for the eraser size input

paint.paintEditor.costume.description: Label for the name of a sound

paint.paintEditor.group.description: Label for the button to group shapes

paint.paintEditor.ungroup.description: Label for the button to ungroup shapes

paint.paintEditor.undo.description: Alt to image for the button to undo an action

paint.paintEditor.redo.description: Alt to image for the button to redo an action

paint.paintEditor.forward.description: Label for the `Send forward on canvas` button

paint.paintEditor.backward.description: Label for the `Send backward on canvas` button

paint.paintEditor.front.description: Label for the `Send to front of canvas` button

paint.paintEditor.back.description: Label for the `Send to back of canvas` button

paint.reshapeMode.reshape.description: Label for the reshape tool, which allows changing the points in the lines of the vectors

paint.roundedRectMode.roundedRect.description: Label for the rounded rectangle tool

paint.selectMode.select.description: Label for the select tool, which allows selecting, moving, and resizing shapes

paint.paintEditor.stroke.description: Label for the color picker for the outline color
